1.Name: Revolver of Fortune
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Use a random bullet for different moves:
Powerful Firework Shell: Fires at the enemy with great force, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and accumulating a large amount of <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup</color>.
Regular Firework Shell: Fires at the enemy, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and accumulating <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup</color>.
Paintball: Fails to fire as flowers leave the muzzle.

1.Name: Luck is Skill
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are 2 or more <color=#F0D12B>Physical Attribute</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> inflicts 100% more Anomaly Buildup.

2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>

1.Name: Lucky Trigger
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>
